meanings: (일하지 않다) idle away, be idle, (informal) loaf around, (실직하다) be out of work[a job], have no job[work], be jobless[unemployed]

vlive.korean: "혼자서 잘 노는..." 푸린 님입니까, 푸른입니까? "I play alone well". Is it Purin or Purun? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] KIM WOO SEOK X LieV - 김우석의 눕방라이브!

vlive.korean: 뭐 누구는 비싼 술 마시면서 노는 거 못하는 줄 알아? It's not because we can't play and drink expensive drinks. 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 너무 좋아해서 짝사랑만 하는 거 이해됨? [엑스엑스(XX)] - EP.04
vlive.english: It's not because we can't play and drink expensive drinks.

vlive.korean: 2월은 학교 들어가기 전에 노는 날... 노는 봄방학 아니에요? You are supposed to chill in February. It's Spring break right now, isn't it? 듣기 View video NCT : 안녕하세요 시즈니!! 제노에요진짜 잠깐 하려고 하는데.. 제노가 보고싶으면 들어오세요!! 이제 시작합니다
vlive.english: You are supposed to chill in February. It's Spring break right now, isn't it?

vlive.korean: 노~ - 친구분들과 이렇게 한번 노는 것도 재밌지 않을까요? No. - Hang out with your friends after putting on makeup like this. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [V PICK! HOW TO in V] 인표의 파티 메이크업✨ (HOW TO DO INPYO’s Party Makeup)
vlive.english: No. - Hang out with your friends after putting on makeup like this.
